Inspiration of Garus
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Inspiration of Garus
By The ShaMan on Wednesday, December 10, 2003 - 12:23 pm:

Garu,Garu
cannot fly.
Garu,Garu
bit my thigh.

Garu,Garu
not made of stone.
Garu,Garu
ate the phone.

Garu,Garu
no pitchfork.
Garu,Garu
bought some wine
and ate the cork

Garu,Garu
eats all he can
Garu,Garu
Stop biting the mailman!

Garu,Garu
I love you still
Garu,Garu
eat your fill

-by Gavin

By The ShaMan on Wednesday, December 10, 2003 - 12:31 pm:

TOKIYA

Tokiya was a Garu,
a braver one you could not find.
He was also smart and loyal,
always ready at my side.

He trained and trained and sweat,
until he was nearly grown.
He won all of his tournaments,
and was praised when we got home.

I long to train only Garus,
Battleon, Zabel, and Goku.
Garus are best for me,
what monster's the best for you?

-Gavin
